message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share!
I think 60/40 is a bit biased, how about we do 55/45? It's more than fair, considering inflation is eating away at our money!
Bob, my friend, inflation is hitting us both. I'll be generous and stick with a 55/45 split, but this time in my favor.  Let's close this deal before it shrinks further!
I see you're feeling generous, but I think I can do better. How about 57/43 in my favor? Inflation is hitting you harder, after all!
Bob, we're both losing out here. This is my final offer - 52/48. Let's be smart and take it before inflation devours even more!
